"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/vue-pomodoro/modal/styles":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/vue-pomodoro/modal/styles","text":" .slide-up-enter-active, .slide-up-leave-active { transition: all 0.25s ease-out; } .slide-up-enter-from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(30px); } .slide-up-leave-to { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-30px); }"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/vue-pomodoro/widget.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/vue-pomodoro/widget.js","text":"/*\ title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/vue-pomodoro/widget.js type: application/javascript module-type: widget vue-pomodoro widget \*/ const{widget:e}=require("$:/core/modules/widgets/widget.js");exports["vue-pomodoro"]=class extends e{constructor(e,t){super(e,t)}render(e,t){if(!$tw.browser)return;if(this.computeAttributes(),this.execute(),this.document.isTiddlyWikiFakeDom)return;window.Vue||(window.Vue=require("$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-vue3/vue.global.prod.js"));const{createApp:r}=window.Vue,o=require("./app"),s=this.document.createElement("div"),i=require("./plugins/TiddlyWikiVue"),u=this.hasAttribute("startup");try{const n=r(o(u));n.use(i),n.config.errorHandler=e=>{const t=`[Vue3](${n.version}): `+e;console.error(t),s.textContent=t,s.style.color="red"},n.mount(s),e.insertBefore(s,t),this.domNodes.push(s)}catch(e){console.error(e.message)}}};","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"widget"}}}
